artist: Larsen Design Studio; Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Various fabric samples all constructed using 'beige malachite' warp. Plain weave,beige warp with off-white and gold metallic weft. One selvedge edge. (beige, green, off-white, gold metallic)
title: Beige Malachite Warp - Development and Sampling
